turns.user_message: What about hey, for that smart thermostat you got, what was the minimum temperature difference you needed to set for the 'away mode' to actually be energy efficient?
turns.expected_response: You mentioned that for your 'EcoSense Pro' smart thermostat, the minimum temperature differential for the 'Away Mode' to be energy efficient is 7 degrees Fahrenheit. (From memory: 'Remember I was raving about that new smart thermostat I installed? The 'EcoSense Pro'. It's got this really cool 'Away Mode' feature, but for it to actually save energy efficiently, you have to set the temperature differential to at least 7 degrees Fahrenheit from your usual comfort setting. Otherwise, it just cycles too often.')

relevant_memories.content: Remember I was raving about that new smart thermostat I installed? The 'EcoSense Pro'. It's got this really cool 'Away Mode' feature, but for it to actually save energy efficiently, you have to set the temperature differential to at least 7 degrees Fahrenheit from your usual comfort setting. Otherwise, it just cycles too often.
Oh, and speaking of home stuff, I finally got around to repainting the living room. Went with that 'Serene Sage' color you recommended. Looks great!
